item.name: Isma's_Tear
item.itemLogic: RIGHTCITY-I + ((SIMPLE1 + SUPERDASH + (CLAW | (WINGS + ACID))) | ((SKIPACID | ACID) + ((TRAM + CLAW) | (TUNNEL + (CLAW | WINGS)))))
